channel.title: Mermaid on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Mermaid on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Make Diagrams with Mermaid
item.description: Mermaid is an awesome software engineering diagramming tool. Write markdowns like this- graph TD A[Client] --> B[Load Balancer] B --> C[Server01] B --> D[Server02] to generate diagrams like this- Find more about mermaid at mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/
